name: ACH_Chapter01
description: Doctor Bo Chen has embarked on the research mission of his life. Never did he expect to find the discovery that would reshape human history. However, the implications of such a discovery has not gone unnoticed.

name: ACH_Chapter02
description: With the Pangu Meteorite now in the hands of the Chinese military, the first to be tested on are its citizens when a small fishing village is targeted for testing. The results will change everything.

name: ACH_Chapter03
description: The United States endures the worst terrorist attack in its history as followers of the Crow Movement seize control of Liberty Island and hold thousands of people hostage, as the braising attack leaves scores of innocent lives dead.

name: ACH_Chapter04
description: In the wake of the Liberty Island Attack, thousands of people died, and a country is left in mourning. But, with no answers on how to prevent another attack, Doctor Juliet Wu looks to the future as Washington approves the formation of the Center for Epidemic Research and Control.

name: ACH_Chapter05
description: Dealing with the pain of losing her sister during the Liberty Island Attack, Captain Adrian Winter is approached by her former CO and asked to join the CERC, a decision that will change her life forever.

name: ACH_Chapter06
description: Lieutenant Edward Lipton leads an attack on a Chinese research base to steal samples of the Pangu Virus but not everything goes to plan...

name: ACH_Chapter07
description: Chelsey visits her Grandma and discovers the beached Voyager  Dawn.

name: ACH_Chapter08
description: Dr.Wu learns of grave news about her daughter and she gets an important call about the Voyager Dawn

name: ACH_Chapter09
description: Chelsey returns to work. But shes not feeling herself..

name: ACH_Chapter10
description: Dr.Wu and Dr.Kira investigate the beaching  of the Voyager Dawn and learn something startling.

name: ACH_Chapter11
description: The Pangu Virus is spreading rapidly through the Memorial Hospital survivors organize to try and stay alive

name: ACH_Chapter12
description: Dr.Wu deploys CERC to Treasure Island. But its nothing they ever trained for.. The stage is being set
